name: Senko No Ronde
overview:
Senko no Ronde (旋光の輪舞) is a fighting game developed by G.Rev and published by Sega for the Sega NAOMI arcade system. The game borrows elements from shoot 'em up classics, with the two players fighting in vehicles, mainly using ranged attacks.

The game was followed by two updates, Senko no Ronde New Version and Senko no Ronde SP, as well as a home port on the Xbox 360, titled WarTech: Senko no Ronde.
